articles.title: Liz Truss wird britische Premierministerin
articles.image_title: Conservative leadership bid. File photo dated 15/09/21 of the newly-appointed Foreign Secretary Liz Truss leaving Number 10 Downing Street, as Prime Minister Boris Johnson reshuffled his Cabinet. Liz Truss and Rishi Sunak are awaiting the results of a poll of Conservative Party members deciding which of them has been selected as the new party leader, and will become the next Prime Minister. Issue date: Monday September 5, 2022. See PA story POLITICS Tories. Photo credit should read: Stefan Rousseau/PA Wire URN:68639456
